descriptions:
Introducing our beautifully crafted Cedar Wood Squirrel House/Nesting Box, perfect for your outdoor space! 

This charming box features a unique burned image of a squirrel on the wall, adding a touch of whimsy to your garden. The glued and nailed construction ensures durability and sturdiness, while the removable roof allows for easy cleaning and hanging. 

Measuring at 12x11x10 inches on the outside and 5.75x9 inches on the inside, with a 3.5-inch squirrel opening, this box provides a cozy and safe space for your furry friends. Plus, with two screws and washers included for mounting, setting up this lovely squirrel house is a breeze.

Don't miss out on giving your backyard visitors a stylish and comfortable home with our Squirrel House/Nesting Box. Get yours today!

Introducing our beautifully crafted Squirrel House/Nesting Box made from premium cedar wood, perfect for outdoor use. This box is expertly constructed with a combination of gluing and nailing for durability and longevity.

Designed with a charming burned image of a squirrel by artist Drew Senesac, this nesting box adds a touch of whimsy to your outdoor space. The removable roof allows for easy cleaning and hanging, while the included mounting hardware makes installation a breeze.

With dimensions of 12x11x10 inches on the outside and 5.75x9 inches on the inside, this box provides ample space for squirrels to nest comfortably. The 3.5-inch squirrel opening ensures easy access for our furry friends.

Don't miss out on the opportunity to bring joy to your backyard with our Squirrel House/Nesting Box. Order yours today and create a cozy haven for squirrels to call home!

Welcome to the ultimate squirrel sanctuary! Our Cedar Wood Squirrel House/Nesting Box is the perfect addition to your outdoor space. Crafted with care, this box is both glued and nailed for durability and longevity.

But what sets our squirrel house apart? Not only does it feature a charming burned image of a squirrel on the wall, but it also boasts a removable roof for easy cleaning and hanging. Plus, we've included two screws and washers for hassle-free mounting.

With outside dimensions of 12x11x10 inches and a cozy inside measuring 5.75x9 inches, this box provides the ideal home for your furry friends. The squirrel opening of 3.5 inches ensures easy access for your backyard visitors.

Don't wait any longer to create a haven for your neighborhood squirrels. Get your Cedar Wood Squirrel House/Nesting Box today and watch as these adorable creatures make themselves right at home in your garden.

Don't wait any longer to create a welcoming home for the squirrels in your yard. Order our Cedar Wood Squirrel House/Nesting Box today and watch as your new neighbors move in and make themselves at home!

Designed for convenience, the removable roof allows for easy cleaning and hanging of the box. With two screws and washers included for mounting, installation is a breeze. The sturdy construction, with both glued and nailed joints, ensures durability and longevity.

The spacious interior dimensions provide a cozy nesting space for squirrels, with a perfectly sized 3.5-inch opening for easy access. Don't miss out on providing a safe and inviting home for your local wildlife with our Squirrel House/Nesting Box. Upgrade your outdoor space today!
